==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|なが|つき|yomi=k}}

===Etymology===
[[長]] (ながい, ''nagai''), "long" + [[月]] (つき, ''tsuki''), "month"

===Pronunciation===
* {{ja-pron|ながつき|y=k|acc=2|dev=3|acc_ref=NHK}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|ながつき}}

# {{lb|ja|archaic|sort=ながつき}} the ninth month of the lunar calendar
# {{lb|ja|poetic|sort=ながつき}} the long month; [[September]]
